details: ● Engineered financial advisory platform using Nous Hermes 2 LLM with FAISS vector database and RAG pipeline, implementing FastAPI microservices and S.T.T for 30% faster query processing.
● Enhanced DCGAN model performance for complex data imputation scenarios, implementing custom loss functions and architecture modifications resulting in 13% accuracy improvement.
● Architected deep convolutional encoder-decoder framework for inverse design of silicon photonic components, achieving 12% improvement in component generation accuracy.
● Pioneered scalable research platform integrating GPT-4 and AWS Bedrock for semantic paper retrieval, implementing automated testing pipelines and RAG-based knowledge extraction system.
● Orchestrated end-to-end React/Django app with OCR and custom spaCy NER model for extracting factory specifications from RFQs, integrating Bloom for automated data processing (95% accuracy).
● Streamlined microservices using FAST APIs and SQL Server for data management, implementing AWS EC2 deployment with real-time document processing pipeline (75% reduction in manual effort).
● Designed factory cost prediction system using regression and PySpark, processing historical RFQ data through custom API integrations to generate automated PLC quotation ranges (90% accuracy).
● Created ML pipeline for casting defect detection using YOLOv5 on AWS SageMaker, building React.js dashboard and AWS IoT integration for real-time monitoring (78% accuracy).
● Led Agile team of 10 in developing computer vision algorithms for P&ID diagram extraction, implementing Mask R-CNN to improve extraction accuracy by 15%.
● Programmed automated ETL pipelines using PySpark and Python with SQL Server integration, implementing Selenium web scraping to process 10,000+ daily records with 80% efficiency gain.
● Established data warehouse architecture using SQL Server and MySQL, building automated data collection systems with Python and Selenium for 10+ concurrent data streams.
● Implemented Decision Tree and K-means Clustering algorithms for customer segmentation analysis of 5,000+ profiles, creating Power BI dashboards that drove 15% CTR improvement.
● Configured scalable PySpark data processing pipelines with custom SQL integrations, achieving 25% reduction in processing time and $10,000+ cost optimization.

● Implemented Decision Tree and K-means Clustering algorithms for customer segmentation analysis of 5,000+ profiles, creating Power BI dashboards that drove 15% CTR improvement.
● Configured scalable PySpark data processing pipelines with custom SQL integrations, achieving 25% reduction in processing time and $10,000+ cost optimization.
● Directed Flutter-based indoor navigation system implementing A* pathfinding algorithm and custom geolocation services, reducing average path discovery time by 40%.
● Deployed backend infrastructure using Python and MongoDB, integrating RESTful APIs for real-time location updates and path optimization with GCP deployment.
● Architected CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment, implementing containerization with Docker and establishing automated build processes on GCP.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Engineering in Instrumentation & Control Engineering
